`r indent` Reliability

`r indent` 95% Confidence Interval
```{r}
if (!is.null(x$total$ase)) {
  pander::pander(data.frame(lower = x$total$raw_alpha - 1.96 * x$total$ase, 
             estimate = x$total$raw_alpha, 
             upper = x$total$raw_alpha + 1.96 * 
  x$total$ase))
}
```

